function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Long commute time by public transit as a concern for urban attribute","Impact":"Increased risk of disease transmission in closed environments such as public transit vehicles","Mitigation":"Adherence to physical distancing, high-frequency cleaning, and proper use of face masks","Technologies":"High-frequency cleaning equipment, monitoring systems for physical distancing, mask detection systems","People":"Commuters, public transit users","Owner":"Public transit authorities, urban planners"},{"Description":"Total viral load and risk of inhaling infectious aerosols increase with time spent in confined space","Impact":"Increased probability of contagion in closed environments such as public transit vehicles","Mitigation":"Adherence to physical distancing, high-frequency cleaning, and proper use of face masks","Technologies":"Ventilation systems, air purifiers, monitoring systems for physical distancing","People":"Commuters, public transit users","Owner":"Public transit authorities, urban planners"},{"Description":"Lack of flexible mobility choices for long-distance travelers on public transit","Impact":"Reduced ability to transition to alternative modes of transportation","Mitigation":"Promotion of planning schemes with dense and well-mixed urban zoning to reduce commute time","Technologies":"Urban zoning planning tools, transportation network optimization software","People":"Commuters, urban designers","Owner":"Urban planners, city authorities"}]}
